description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 21/4153/FUL dated 11/11/21 for 'Demolition of existing 72 bed care home (use class C2) and the erection of a 3-6 storey (including lower ground floor)108 bed care home (C2 use class) with ancillary communal and staff facilities, car parking, refuse storage, cycle storage, landscaping and associated works.' Amendments include: Alterations to the green wall extent and construction; Revised green roof specification; New roof access hatches and maintenance paths added to flat roof; New pedestrian footpath added to the front of the building; New delivery parking bay added to front of site; New vehicle drop off bay to the front of the site including retaining wall and railings Revised bin store; Re-alignment of rear retaining wall and inclusion of crib wall above; New footpath added to rear for fire escape purposes; Repositioning of bay and balconies to central courtyard; Bird and bat boxes added to elevations; Fix closing of some windows in the side elevation; Minor wall, window and door realignment to align with the buildings structural frame; New fire escape door added and 2 number windows indicated as Automatic Opening Vents for fire safety purposes; Additional escape door, fenestration alterations and Louvre vent added in central courtyard fire escape purposes and allow alignment with structural frame
